item.title: Version 0.5.0
item.sparkle:releaseNotes:
Retrace 0.5 (from 0.1)

Highlights

  • Major Timeline upgrade: faster scrubbing/scrolling, seamless open/close, improved readability, "show context" in filtered mode, and tighter macOS-native feel.
  • Much better Search: Unicode-aware full-text search (better accuracy for nonâ€‘ASCII text) and improved search UX with grouped/expanded results.
  • Tags + filtering: tag your history and filter the timeline by app, URL, title, and tags.
  • New Dashboard: redesigned analytics with charts/breakdowns (including better browser breakdowns with favicon support) and daily metrics.

New

  • Custom database location and custom storage location support.
  • Recording shortcuts + improved settings experience.
  • Local-only "analytics" logging for internal usage/debug (no cloud dependency).
  • Milestone/achievement notifications and reminders for required permissions.

Performance & Reliability

  • Faster timeline block calculations and improved timeline responsiveness.
  • OCR pipeline improvements: faster realtime OCR for recent frames and reduced unnecessary OCR work while scrubbing.
  • Video improvements: better compression, fixed B-frame mismatch issues, and updated seeking via AVAssetImageGenerator.
  • Reduced flicker when switching videos on the timeline.

Rewind + Browser Context

  • Rewind importer/querying fixes (including post-tags changes) and improved reliability.
  • Better browser URL/title extraction (more browsers supported, plus fallbacks when URL isn't available).

Other Fixes

  • Segment persistence improvements across Mac sleep/wake.
  • Keyboard shortcut fixes and better text selection/copy behavior in timeline UI.
  • UI polish: unified colors, improved settings, and updated highlight styling.

Notes

  • This update includes database migrations (tags, daily metrics, Unicode search). First launch may take a bit longer while data updates.
